text: Rudawa is a village in Krak贸w County, Lesser Poland Voivodeship, Poland. The village is on the road from Krak贸w to Trzebinia and by the Rudawa river. It is about west of Zabierz贸w and west of the city of Krak贸w. Category:Villages in Lesser Poland Voivodeship
